content: once upon a time in a valley surrounded by emerald greens and whispering rivers there hatched a baby dragon with scales that glowed like the dawn this wasn t any ordinary dragon he was born under a shooting star which bestowed upon him a very special gift the power to bring good luck to all who were kind to him a fantastic addition to any dragon enthusiast s collection the dragon is a symbol of 2024 this knitting pattern includes detailed instructions providing clear guidance on how to achieve the perfect dragon features you ll find a list of recommended materials and helpful tips to make your knitting experience as smooth as soaring through the skies about pattern □ stitch by stitch knitting pattern □ 2 in 1 - knitted flat 2 needles and knitted in the round versions given □ video tutorials stitches assembling process the video serves as a visual supplement for your project providing additional support □ process photos □ how to assemble instruction □ all yarn parameters are given so you can choose the yarn from your stash as well □ tools recommendations □ baby dragon is approx 20cm/7 8 inches tall □ with this pattern you can make your very own dino □ pattern language english us □ want to see more from me my shop https //www etsy com/shop/polushkabunnyknit □ if you re eager to discover more of my countless ideas you re warmly invited to visit my instagram gallery @polushkabunny
